content.raw:
As far as I know, the submission process is still one image per vehicle so if you need different launch parameters per vehicle, you have to have multiple images \(not great but not the absolute worst with tagging\).

`/subt/start` is automatically called whenever you enter the environment from the staging area.  Likewise I _believe_ `/subt/finish` is automatically called whenever your allotted time runs out.
content.html:
As far as I know, the submission process is still one image per vehicle so if you need different launch parameters per vehicle, you have to have multiple images (not great but not the absolute worst with tagging).

/subt/start is automatically called whenever you enter the environment from the staging area. Likewise I believe /subt/finish is automatically called whenever your allotted time runs out.
